mapper.select: select tc.theater_close_seq, t.name, tc.theater_seq, to_char(tc.start_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd')as start_date, to_char(tc.end_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd')as end_date from tbltheater t inner join tbltheaterclose tc on t. theater_seq=tc.theater_seq order by tc.theater_close_seq desc
select * from tbltheater where name not like '%(운영종료)%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbltheaterclose (theater_close_seq, start_date, end_date, theater_seq) values (seqtblTheaterClose.nextVal, to_date(#{start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{theater_seq, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.*, (select name from tblTheater where theater_seq = a.theater_seq)as name from tblTheaterClose a where theater_close_seq = #{theater_close_seq}
mapper.update: update tbltheaterclose set start_date = #{start_date}, end_date = #{end_date} where theater_close_seq = #{theater_close_seq}
